item.title: Wheels24.co.za | WATCH | Range Rover spices up its Velar line-up, adds new hybrid model to the range
item.description: Range Rover updated its desirable Velar range by adding new engine choices and a 640Nm hybrid model.

item.title: Wheels24.co.za | A South African favourite on the horison - Here's when we can expect Isuzu's new D-Max
item.description: The new Isuzu D-Max's local arrival is highly anticipated and the bakkie looks to unsettle the establishment.

item.description: If Mercedes-Benz kept this project alive, it would have revolutionised the half-ton bakkie market.

item.description: When it comes to choosing your next bakkie, South Africans often know which model they want.

item.title: Wheels24.co.za | OPINION | Big General or big replica? Foton's new bakkie looks mighty familiar
item.description: Foton's new bakkie, the Big General, might upset a few Blue Oval fans, but just what did this automaker do wrong?

item.title: Wheels24.co.za | Mitsubishi adds Exceed model to updated Pajero Sport range
item.description: Mitsubishi has updated its Pajero Sport with a new front grille and a higher specification level. A new flagship Exceed model with 4x4 joins the existing 4x2 and 4x4 models.

item.title: Wheels24.co.za | WATCH | Why is the world so obsessed with SUVs?
item.description: What is the reason behind the huge popularity of SUVs? Deutsche Welle investigates why carmakers won't stop manufacturing them and why a part of our brain may be the reason we like them.

item.title: Wheels24.co.za | What South Africans want: a double cab for under R400 000
item.description: 'When it comes to double cabs, buyers are quite willing to pay up to R400 000. This was the most searched price bracket for double cab bakkies during August', says AutoTrader's George Mienie.

item.title: Wheels24.co.za | Volkswagen adds 190kW Amarok to local bakkie line-up

item.description: BMW's 3.0-liter turbodiesel power meets single-cab E39 bodywork, for a bakkie match made in heaven.

item.description: The latest Gazoo upgrade package from Toyota makes for quite a tidy crossover.

item.title: Wheels24.co.za | RoadTrip | Visiting the threatened Renosterveld in Ford's bi-turbo WildTrak 4x4
item.description: Did you know that only about 5% of the original Renosterveld is left within the Overberg? Ferdi de Vos drives a Ford Ranger Wildtrak to this threatened habitat.
